subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: For 26 years, through bouts with cancer, and other afflictions and distractions, Jim Calhoun badgered and bullied his Connecticut program to dizzying heights.
snippet: For 26 years, through bouts with cancer, and other afflictions and distractions, Jim Calhoun badgered and bullied his Connecticut program to dizzying heights.
